title: Katagami Textile Stencil with Abstract Diagonal Grid Design
dimensions:
paper: H. 27.2 x W. 42.1 cm (10 11/16 x 16 9/16 in.)
pattern unit dimensions: H. 18.5 x W. 34.7 cm (7 5/16 x 13 11/16 in.)
creditline: Harvard Art Museums/Arthur M. Sackler Museum, Museum Collection
medium: Chûban (medium-sized) minogami (mulberry bark paper) treated with persimmon juice and cut using the "dôgubori" (punch-carving) and "tsukibori" (thrust-carving) techniques; with ink
